"Rare crimson species wielding huge arms:
"Are you aware that recently the mining base at the
Planet Lillipur was attacked from the Darkers?
We have received reports of the existence of
rare species found in the Dark Vibras of the large
Darkers that appeared.
The reports are still unexplained portions.
I think that there will be a lot of accompanying
difficulties, and will you lend a hand for the
purpose of investigations?
*Target Dark Rinse of Lv.60 and higher"
"巨腕を振るいし真紅の希少種"

"惑星リリーパの採掘基地が、最近ダーカーの
襲撃に遭遇しているのは知っているな？
そこに現れる大型ダーカーの
ダーク・ビブラスに希少種がいるという
目撃情報が我々の元に寄せられた。
情報はいまだ少なく、未解明な部分も多い。
困難も多く伴うとは思うが、調査の為に
協力してもらえないだろうか？

※Lv.60以上のダーク・リンゼスが対象"
